subject: Heel rest dimensions
description_text:
Hi there

Are you able to provide the measurements for the baseplate and the heel
rest?

I have a two pedal set and want to make sure I can have the spacing
correct. Can you share the holes measurements?

I am also interested in adding bass shakers, so knowing the total dimension
of the base plate, and the height of the heel rest spacers would be useful.
Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Chanho,    Here is the information you require. We hope it proves helpful. Should you require anything further, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Hi, thank you for the fast answer!

I am curious in the Simsonn Manager software there is a maximum force (kg)
setting

Is this kg for pressure on the pedal plate, or at the load cell sensor?

Also, what does changing the elastomer from soft/medium/hard do in the
software? I know how to change them on the physical pedal, but what is this
setting?

Thank you
Chanho

On Mon, 22 Sept 2025, 23:25 service@simsonn.com,

Hello, adjusting the soft/medium/hard settings for the elastic element within the software determines the upper limit for the maximum force you can set. Once the maximum force (kg) is configured in the software, any force exceeding this value will not be recognised. We recommend performing manual calibration first before setting an appropriate value.
